attributes.action: The use of Jesus Christ on television and radio
attributes.additional_details:
Television and radio programmes e.g. soaps, dramas, films, plays, and presenters/DJ's use or script 'Jesus Christ..!' 'Jesus..!'as a swear word which I find offensive to my Christian belief.
I ask if the derogatory use of 'Jesus Christ' be written out of said soaps etc, and presenters/DJ's are educated and trained in what can be offensive use of language to their listeners/viewers.
Thank you
